thread.section_title: SimplyEyeglasses.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SimplyEyeglasses.com | www.simplyeyeglasses.com
thread.title: Jay Young

author: Jay Young
title: Jay Young
text: I have used Simply Eyeglasses several times and it is very easy to get your eyeglasses ordered. They have great communication and will respond to any questions by e-mail or even a phone call. It's quick and easy to navigate the website and the cost is very competitive to other sites. It usually takes about 2 weeks unless there is a problem and they will notify you if it will take longer. Give thema try, you won't be dissapointed
